title.narrative: Peer Review of the Actuarial Valuation of the General Social Insurance Scheme as at 31 December 2017, including provision of the necessary modifications to the existing actuarial modelling framework,

description.narrative: This project provide technical assistance for the necessary modifications to the existing actuarial modelling framework, as per social insurance law requirements and will deliver an ILO report on the peer review of the Actuarial Valuation of the General Social Insurance Scheme as at 31 December, 2017.

participating-org.narrative: Cyprus, Ministry of Labour and Social Insurance

department.narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)

sector.narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output 8.2. Increased capacity of member States to improve governance and sustainability of social protection systems

transaction.ref: CYP/19/01/CYP-2019-CYP101 - Expertise of Ministry of labour's officials and of social partners is enhanced in the field of the financial , economic and fiscal sustainability of the national social security systems
